thread.section_title: Hilton London Angel Islington - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: family weekend break
thread.title_full: family weekend break - Review of Hilton London Angel Islington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Philip M
title: family weekend break
text: A lovely welcome from reception when we arrived. Our room was on the top floor with lovely views over London. Use of executive lounge was really worthwhile, we felt it was value for money. Our room was v clean & the beds v comfortable.Very convenient location. 15 minute bus ride to centre of London.
